attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The start up costs of increasing the  the use of carbon neutral derived fuels in the UK to  need to be defrayed as much as possible. One way to do this is to have a favourable taxation structure which will allow that development of infrastructure and encourage manufacurers of both the vehicles and the bio fuels to invest. Time is running out and we are barely sacatching the surface in the use of bio fuels as part of the carbon footprint reduction.
This government needs to put its money where its mouth is.
